scripts.android: adb reverse tcp:8081 tcp:8081 && react-native run-android
scripts.clean: rm -rf ./node_modules && rm -rf ./ios/build && rm -rf ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData && yarn && cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd ..
scripts.nuke: rm -rf ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData && rm -rf ./ios/DerivedData && watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* && rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-native-packager-cache-* && rm -rf $TMPDIR/metro-bundler-cache-* && rm -rf ./node_modules/ && rm -rf ./ios/Pods/ && rm -rf ./ios/build/ && yarn cache clean && yarn install && yarn start --reset-cache
